result.arabic_text: قَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِي وَٱتَّبَعُواْ مَن لَّمۡ يَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا
result.translation: Nuhu aravuga ati “Nyagasani wanjye! Mu by’ukuri (abantu banjye) banyigometseho, banakurikira uwo imitungo n’abana bitagize icyo byongerera uretse igihombo.”
